channel.title: Problems with my server!?!
channel.description:
ok i downloaded an already made source from melissa T's thread and im not sure wat to do i hav set up the port and everything i just need to no how to connect it to the server or moparscape or watever i hav to do and then i need to no how to log into my own server someone please help me with this im extremely lost here lol
ohh yeah i have got a few other sources that i hav downloaded and hav already been made by some1 else and i got 1 of them connected to the server but i didnt no how to login to it myself is there something i hav to setup in the source for me to login or something like that please tell me.

item.title: Problems with my server!?!
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

#1: Runserver is running.

#2: Open Moparscape or a similar client.

#3: Type in your server IP or leave it blank to connect from localHost.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with my server!?!
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

lol i know where runserver is i hav double clicked on it lol and it has come up with miss. salibsoft and wat does that other guy mean by clicking on a client like mopar does he actually mean use the moparscape client

i clicked on runserver it is connected(online) then i opened up the moparscape client i typed in my username and pass and left the ip blank and it didnt work[br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2007, 09:06:08 PM[/size][hr]do i have to click on start server then put my username and pass in and then leave server ip blank???

Read full topic
